title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 30 - Producer Compensation Transparency
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 30 - Producer Compensation Transparency

State Regulations
§ 30.1 - Purposes
§ 30.2 - Definitions
§ 30.3 - Disclosure of producer compensation, ownership interests and role in the insurance transaction
§ 30.4 - Retention of disclosure
§ 30.5 - Exceptions
§ 30.6 - Obligations of an authorized insurer
§ 30.7 - Conformity with other laws

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. II, pt. 30

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301; art. 21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
